arts.ttl: Champions League Matchday 2 Predictions: Thriller in store at the Metropolitano
arts.sum: James Mason has picked out a score prediction for all 18 matches taking place on Matchday 2 of the Champions League.

arts.ttl: Atletico Madrid vs Eintracht Frankfurt predictions: Atleti to grind out the win
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt thrashed Galatasaray in their Champions League opener, but Ross Kilvington is backing Atletico Madrid to inflict a defeat on the Bundesliga outfit at the Metropolitano.
